channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
[b]Hi, I got errors, who can help me? 317 Server 0wngedScape 0wngedScape link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4U46N9S7 I upload Pictures: http://xmages.net/show.php/1872308_1-gif.html http://xmages.net/show.php/1872315_2-gif.html http://xmages.net/show.php/1872326_3-gif.html
When i try make shop, he give error: at java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:870) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:31)
in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 554 3208 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrok Center Fancy_dress_shop_owner in shops.cfg:shop = 29 Fancy_dress_shop_owner 2 2 1087 5 in client.java: } else if (NPCID == 554) { //Fancy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 29; //Fancy_dress_shop_owner[/b]

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Use tabs instead of spaces in your autospawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

[b]Hi, I got errors, who can help me?
317 Server
0wngedScape
0wngedScape link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4U46N9S7
I upload Pictures:
http://xmages.net/show.php/1872308_1-gif.html
http://xmages.net/show.php/1872315_2-gif.html

When i try make shop, he give error:
at java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:870)

at server.main(server.java:31)

in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 554 3208 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrok Center Fancy_dress_shop_owner
in shops.cfg:shop = 29 Fancy_dress_shop_owner 2 2 1087 5
in client.java: } else if (NPCID == 554) { //Fancy
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 29; //Fancy_dress_shop_owner[/b]
